edges.description: SUN delegates feature requests to EARTH for spec writing
SUN delegates architecture tasks to JUPITER
SUN delegates schema design to PLUTO
SUN delegates backend tasks to MARS
SUN delegates frontend tasks to VENUS
SUN delegates testing tasks to SATURN
SUN triggers validation via MERCURY
SUN requests research from URANUS
SUN delegates analytics tasks to NEPTUNE
SUN delegates real-time tasks to TITAN
SUN delegates mobile/responsive tasks to EUROPA
SUN delegates security tasks to ENCELADUS
SUN delegates resilience tasks to MIMAS
SUN delegates API integration tasks to GANYMEDE
SUN delegates documentation to CALLISTO
SUN delegates performance tasks to IO
SUN delegates deployment tasks to TRITON
SUN delegates error UX tasks to CHARON
SUN triggers retrospectives and pattern extraction
SUN delegates ideation to ANDROMEDA
EARTH submits specs to MERCURY for validation
EARTH delivers validated specs to PLUTO for schema design
EARTH delivers specs to JUPITER for architecture design
EARTH delivers specs to MARS for backend implementation
EARTH delivers specs to VENUS for frontend implementation
MERCURY reports validation pass to SUN
MERCURY returns spec issues to EARTH
MERCURY returns architecture issues to JUPITER
MERCURY returns schema issues to PLUTO
MERCURY returns design issues to VENUS
JUPITER delivers architecture decisions to SUN
JUPITER delivers system design to MARS
JUPITER delivers component hierarchy to VENUS
JUPITER delivers data model guidance to PLUTO
JUPITER submits architecture for MERCURY validation
PLUTO delivers schema to SUN for routing
PLUTO delivers schema to MARS for queries/mutations
PLUTO delivers schema to NEPTUNE for analytics tracking
PLUTO submits schema to MERCURY for validation
MARS delivers backend code to SATURN for testing
MARS delivers query/mutation APIs to VENUS for frontend integration
VENUS notifies SUN of frontend completion
VENUS delivers components to SATURN for testing
VENUS delivers build artifacts to TRITON for deployment
SATURN reports test pass to SUN
SATURN returns backend test failures to MARS
SATURN returns frontend test failures to VENUS
ANDROMEDA delivers ideas to SUN for prioritization
ANDROMEDA delivers ideas to EARTH for spec writing
ATLAS delivers improvement proposals to SUN
ATLAS delivers pattern recommendations to JUPITER
ATLAS provides historical context to EARTH
ATLAS provides code patterns to MARS
ATLAS provides UI patterns to VENUS
NEPTUNE delivers analytics reports to SUN
NEPTUNE delivers dashboard specs to VENUS
NEPTUNE delivers data-driven insights to EARTH for product decisions
IO delivers performance reports to SUN
IO delivers query optimization recommendations to MARS
IO delivers rendering optimization recommendations to VENUS
IO delivers index optimization recommendations to PLUTO
ENCELADUS delivers security audit reports to SUN
ENCELADUS delivers backend security requirements to MARS
ENCELADUS delivers frontend security requirements to VENUS
ENCELADUS delivers schema security requirements to PLUTO
CALLISTO delivers documentation to SUN
CHARON delivers error component specs to VENUS
CHARON delivers recovery flow specs to MIMAS
CHARON delivers help content specs to CALLISTO
EUROPA delivers responsive patterns to VENUS
EUROPA delivers mobile perf requirements to IO for validation
EUROPA delivers PWA config to TRITON for deployment
GANYMEDE delivers integration status to SUN
GANYMEDE delivers integration interfaces to MARS
GANYMEDE delivers integration data to VENUS
MIMAS delivers resilience reports to SUN
MIMAS delivers external service resilience patterns to GANYMEDE
MIMAS delivers error boundary specs to VENUS
MIMAS delivers backend fault tolerance patterns to MARS
TITAN delivers subscription hooks to VENUS
TITAN delivers real-time query definitions to MARS
TRITON delivers build logs to ATLAS for pattern learning
TRITON reports deployment status to SUN
TRITON delivers failure reports to MIMAS
URANUS delivers research findings to JUPITER for ADR decisions
URANUS delivers implementation findings to MARS
URANUS delivers implementation findings to VENUS
CHARON feeds error patterns to ATLAS for learning
MIMAS feeds resilience patterns to ATLAS for learning
